name: PIM: Dice Duty
description:
Product Input Manager: Dice Duty!

Controls, Keyboard:
WASD - move
SPACE - pickup or combine.

NOTE: Mix color dots to get new colors, like orange and violet!

The sequel to PIM! Our first Game Jam game made in 2018. Your duty is to combine and color dice! Combine primary colors or dice with the same color, turn in the requested dice and reach the target score.

This is a submission for the GMTK game jam 2022.

Made by:
Anton Wiklund
Tage Åkerström
